price: 18. Likolo likopasukaka (na somo wana) mpe akokokisaka elaka naye, wana ezali na tembe te.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
